Articles.Content:
After reading the Wiki and seeing or hearing about other peoples' encounters with these mystical beasts, I set my sight to find them, to no such luck.

So I got to being curious on how many people actually encountered them.

Pictures are interesting and down right frightening!

The "Kraken" is (percieved as) anything that "Causes Problems with my design" with loose relationship to physics...

What ISN'T the "Kraken"?
Your search for the elusive Kraken... will take you into the depths of space... to one of the distant moons of Jool... *evil cackle*
...Where it sleeps for eternity...waiting for the day when it shall rise again...

Your search for the elusive Kraken... will take you into the depths of space... to one of the distant moons of Jool... *evil cackle*

I've been to bop, first moon I've landed on at the Jool system, still haven't found it
